text: is a Japanese slalom canoeist who has competed since 2008. He finished 12th in the C2 event at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro together with Tsubasa Sasaki. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male canoeists Category:Olympic canoeists of Japan Category:Canoeists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Canoeists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Japan
title: Shota Sasaki
